model.game.team.ai.neuralnet

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.game.team.ai.neuralnet.Layer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A single layer in the network. Contains the weights and biases coming into this layer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Size int.

        the int

      • evaluate

        public Vector evaluate(Vector i)
        Feed the in-vector, i, through this layer. Stores a copy of the out vector.
        Parameters:
        i - The input vector
        Returns:
        The out vector o (i.e. the result of o = iW + b)

      • hasPrecedingLayer

        public boolean hasPrecedingLayer()
        Has preceding layer boolean.
        Returns:
        the boolean

      • addDeltaWeightsAndBiases

        public void addDeltaWeightsAndBiases(Matrix dW,
                                     Vector dB)
        Add upcoming changes to the Weights and Biases. This does not mean that the network is updated.
        Parameters:
        dW - the d w
        dB - the d b

      • updateWeightsAndBias

        public void updateWeightsAndBias()
        Takes an average of all added Weights and Biases and tell the optimizer to apply them to the current weights and biases. Also applies L2 regularization on the weights if used.

      • setOptimizer
